channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Pitagórica for Jornal de Notícias, 9–12 September 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata (EPP): 20.1–26.8%
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 35.4–43.1%
  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 7.9–12.7%
  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 4.1–7.8%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (GUE/NGL): 5.9–10.2%
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (Greens/EFA): 2.0–4.9%
  • Aliança (*): 0.8–2.8%

  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (Greens/EFA): 3.7–5.5%
